message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway, would you be willing to consider $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I can do $130, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $127?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I'm willing to make a small concession. I can meet you at $128, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $126?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $129, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
I understand that we're getting close to the end, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $125?
